constituent: pit, soil, dirt, ground, whirlwind, top hat, wind
heisigStory: A whirlwind begins to dig its way into the soil like a drill until it makes a deep pit.
koohiiStory1: A whirlwind digs a hole in the ground throwing out lots of dirt until it ends up with a giant pit.
koohiiStory2: Tazmanian Devil whirlwinds a pit into the soil. Note: Take care difference between pit and rut.
myStory: lỗ. đất với tinh thần cao sẽ tạo ra lỗ kkk. lỗ là tinh thần của đất. lỗ làm cho bước đi rơi cả mũ
